tips.text: If you want a soda go to the vending machine next to the ice Cream place near the music barge it's only $2 for a 20oz bottle instead of $2 for a can at one of the carts.

Here you’ll feel the power, romance and glamour of Gotham. The Statue of Liberty presents her torch of freedom while downtown’s skyscrapers reach the clouds.
Come during one of the big summer thunderstorms with an umbrella and watch bolts of lightening hit the skyscrapers in lower Manhattan.
